DOC.brief_summary: The current trial will examine the efficacy and safety of Exubera administered as a mealtime insulin compared to lispro, when added to an existing regimen of basal insulin glargine + or = Oral Agents (OAs). Dose titrations will be provided which should allow a large proportion of subjects to reach target glycosylated hemoglobin (A1C) levels.
DOC.brief_title: Exubera vs Lispro in a Lantus-based Regimen for Improved Glycemic Control in Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Adults with type 2 diabetes using LantusÂ® (insulin glargine) as their basal insulin, not at glycemic goal. lung disease current smoking or discontinued smoking within past 6 months
